TextBlock.Text: KARENIA: Okay, the <color=purple>Bramble</color> is primed, it’s now or never.
AZOLLA: Ditylum has yet to return from his task. Should we not wait for his assistance?
KARENIA: I would really like to, but I can’t guarantee how long the <color=purple>Bramble</color> is going to stay in this state. If we don’t do this now, we might never get another chance.
AZOLLA: Very well then, I suppose we must proceed. Nesia, Sennetti, is the equipment in place?
NESIA: Everything is ready, the equipment should automatically supply nutrition to the node as the <color=purple>Bramble</color> grows it.
AZOLLA: Excellent. Okalis, Amylax, you two are the visual and auditory organs of this operation. Notify everyone if anything seems amiss. Karenia, we are ready for you all to begin.
KARENIA: Good. Okay everyone, follow my lead, try and guide the <color=purple>Bramble</color> to the <color=orange>Eye</color>.
KARENIA: I think it’s working! The <color=purple>Bramble</color> is heeding our calls! I can feel it probing, searching for the source of the signal!
AMYLAX: Something feels wrong, is the <color=orange>Eye</color> supposed to be big and hot? I swear that the <color=purple>Bramble</color> is focusing on something of that nature.

OKALIS: Big and hot? No aspect of the Eye’s signal suggests it should have either of those qualities. Unless… a star! Azolla! We need to shut off the project now! The Bramble is attempting to grow the distant node in the core of a star!
AZOLLA: No! Nesia, shut off the equipment! Everyone, direct the <color=purple>Bramble</color> away! We cannot allow it to-
